title: can't find a temp sensor on 820-2915
message: this board has a TM0P sensor error. it's the sensor for the dc-in proximity airflow. i'm not sure which one that it is

title: can't find a temp sensor on 820-2915
message:
If you got the error code from ASD, post the entire error message.
Run ASD in Continue mode; there may be more errors.

Check if problem remains disconnecting webcam.
Also test with known good trackpad flex/board.

DCIN board is board is in the same area as LVDS connector.
Look at page 50 and guess which sensor corresponds.

Be aware, if TM0P is RAM related instead, its sensor is on the trackpad side.

title: can't find a temp sensor on 820-2915
message: it says that it can't read it

title: can't find a temp sensor on 820-2915
message:
Write signal names correctly please.
Tm0P is not the same as TM0P (which should be RAM related).

Is that the only error you get in ASD?
Did you do the above mentioned tests?

Check Q5502 and its traces to U5570.
